query: INSERT INTO adminPermissions (userId, balanceManagement, userManagement, permissionManagement, memberManagement, staffManagement, status, createdBy) SELECT u.id, 1, 1, 1, 1, 0, 'active', 1 FROM users u WHERE u.role = 'staff_admin' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM adminPermissions ap WHERE ap.userId = u.id);
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user XTqR3P9v8tSgKnm.root --database jHCPjtWAoWrQh3F8kPBEFC --execute INSERT INTO adminPermissions (userId, balanceManagement, userManagement, permissionManagement, memberManagement, staffManagement, status, createdBy) SELECT u.id, 1, 1, 1, 1, 0, 'active', 1 FROM users u WHERE u.role = 'staff_admin' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM adminPermissions ap WHERE ap.userId = u.id);
